Infectum.turoyo: u=muklo hēš meqəm d-məbləʕ k-məlʕəs b-aʕ=ʕarše 184; 3/36;
translations: die Speise wird, ehe sie heruntergeschluckt wird, mit den Zähnen gekaut

Infectum-wa.turoyo: i=naqla d-ko-maḥto u=fako b-feme k-omər xwazi loʕsát-way-li-yo žnuka maḥtát-way-le b-femi 184; 77/45;
translations: Every time she put a piece of bread into his mouth he would say: “Oh mother, if only you would chew it for me and then would put it into my mouth!”
